html:
Law for Managers

This module aims to provide you with a critical understanding of the fundamental building blocks of Business Law, with a view to developing your capabilities in analyzing, reflecting on the legal system within a business perspective.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Have an understanding of the relevant legal system and its impact on business and organisations. (Knowledge and Understanding)

+  Evaluate and analyse arguments and scenarios and apply the law, drawing reasoned conclusions. (Analysis)

+  Present information, together with analysis and argument, in a form which will be understood by its intended audience. (Problem Solving)

Module Content:
